Package Appointment

Class AppointmentManager

Object
AppointmentManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
AppointmentSchedulingService, ViewAppointment
public class AppointmentManager extends Object implements AppointmentSchedulingService, ViewAppointment
The AppointmentManager class provides functionality for managing appointment scheduling, rescheduling, cancellations, and viewing appointments.

This class implements both AppointmentSchedulingService and ViewAppointment interfaces, allowing it to handle appointment-related functionalities such as booking, modifying, and viewing schedules.

It interacts with DataProcessor, dataReader, and dataWriter to manage appointment data and updates availability slots.

Note: Ensure "Appointment_List.csv" and "AvailabilitySlot_List.csv" files are available for correct functionality.

Since:
2024-11-15
Version:
1.0
Author:
Lee Xing Juan Rennie
